*

Nascar: car #24 runs ChalleNGe logo on the hood and rear panels of the car in Atlanta

"

  • back
    to archive

Home› f1vlad's blog archive

Great exposure of ChalleNGe this weekend in Atlanta Kobalt Tools 500, this was a dream of many leaders of this great program, and now it comes true. Jeff Gordon's car No. 24 Dupont National Guard Youth ChalleNGe Impala SS! I am not adding any thing in here. According to official website, the car title is indeed National Guard Youth Challenge Impala SS.

I was told that car would have hood logo of ChalleNGe, but was surprised to find out that rear panels had it as well.

It would be interesting to watch for any website traffic spikes as a result of this exposure — I will keep a close eye on it.

Photo credits: zimbio.com
